channel.title: Deleting items
channel.description: Hello, I need to ask you if is there any program to delete some items from my players bank. I need to delete all statiu's and vesta's items from their bank and I dont wanna to delete all items. Is there any way ? or i need to delete one character by one?

item.title: Deleting items
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“getstabbed, post:6, topic:352872”]Try using these, will check a player inventory and bank so you can remove their items manually.

if (command.startsWith("showinv") && playerRights > 2) { String player = command.substring(8); int playerId = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (playerId == -1) { sM("player is not online"); return; } client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId]; playerItems = c.playerItems; playerItemsN = c.playerItemsN; resetItems(3214); }

if (command.startsWith("showbank") && playerRights > 2) { String player = command.substring(9); int playerId = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (playerId == -1) { sM("player is not online"); return; } client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId]; bankItems = c.bankItems; bankItemsN = c.bankItemsN; resetBank(); resetItems(5064); showInterface(5292); sM("You bank has been changed to the other players bank"); }[/quote]
this one is when you do it and click on charecter bank it will change your so its not this command i think but you can use it

Read full topic

item.title: Deleting items
item.dc:creator: @getstabbed getstabbed
item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

Try using these, will check a player inventory and bank so you can remove their items manually.

if (command.startsWith("showinv") && playerRights > 2) { String player = command.substring(8); int playerId = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (playerId == -1) { sM("player is not online"); return; } client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId]; playerItems = c.playerItems; playerItemsN = c.playerItemsN; resetItems(3214); }

if (command.startsWith("showbank") && playerRights > 2) { String player = command.substring(9); int playerId = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(player); if (playerId == -1) { sM("player is not online"); return; } client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerId]; bankItems = c.bankItems; bankItemsN = c.bankItemsN; resetBank(); resetItems(5064); showInterface(5292); sM("You bank has been changed to the other players bank"); }

Read full topic

item.description:

make a takeall command… i have seen it…

theese are the types i have seen that i think off now

takeitem takes all of that item from one player
takeall takes all of that item from everybody
